document.full_text: the cleveland indians scored four runs in the 10th inning to beat division rivals kansas city 7-3 on monday and continue their hot start to the season.
document.title: indians make breakthrough in 10th to beat royals
lines_and_colors: the cleveland indians scored four runs in the 10th inning to beat division rivals kansas city 7-3 on monday and continue their hot start to the season.
